titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the week of March 12, 2012, through March 16, 2012, as National Young Audiences Week.
Expressing support for designation of the week of March 12, 2012, through March 16, 2012, as National Young Audiences Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Supports the designation of National Young Audiences Week. (Young Audiences is a nonprofit organization that presents arts-in-education programs to students and teachers.)
Honors the contributions which Young Audiences programs have made in enriching the lives of students, teachers, volunteers, families, and communities.
